mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT w.idx AS idx, p.product_name AS productName, TO_CHAR(pd.price, 'FM999,999,999,999') AS price, pd.img_id AS imgId FROM wish_list w JOIN product p ON w.product_id = p.product_id JOIN product_dtl pd ON p.product_id = pd.product_id WHERE w.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY w.idx desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wish_list (idx, member_id, product_id) VALUES ( wish_list_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, #{product_id} )
